# Discussion Points


- Do we need to focus on the edge/periphery of the tissue?

- Fine tuning for artefacts.
  - Intestinal metaplasia (brush border) is also stainig black. 
  - Surgical margin ink for mucosal polyps.

- How to stratify the levels? 
  - Do we need to count the number of bacteria?

- Will there be hypercorrect results? 
   - Does it worth treatment. WE are facing with tetra penta antibiotic resistant drugs?
